assignment.title: Analyzing Ethical Challenges in AI Systems
assignment.objective: Understand and evaluate ethical considerations in AI systems.
expectedCapabilities: Propose solutions for ethical AI development
assignment.submissionInstructions: Submit a detailed report highlighting ethical issues and solutions for the provided case study.

tasks.title: Write a Report
tasks.description: Write a report detailing the ethical challenges and solutions proposed for an AI system.

steps.title: Identify Ethical Concerns
steps.description: Review the provided AI system case studies and note down potential ethical concerns.

steps.title: Propose Solutions
steps.description: For each identified concern, propose plausible solutions to address the ethical issues.

checkForUnderstanding.question: What is one way to reduce bias in AI?
Why is transparency important in AI?
What should be prioritized in privacy concerns with AI?

subsections.title: Introduction to Ethics in AI
subsections.content: Ethics in AI involve understanding the implications of AI systems on human behavior and society. It requires a framework to address questions of fairness, privacy, and bias.

quizzes.question: What is one key concern in AI ethics?

subsections.title: Bias in AI Systems
subsections.content: Bias can be introduced in AI through training data, algorithms, or human interference. Understanding sources of bias helps in developing more equitable AI applications.

quizzes.question: How can bias be introduced in AI?

subsections.title: Privacy Concerns with AI
subsections.content: AI systems often require large datasets, leading to potential privacy violations. Balancing data utility and privacy is crucial.

quizzes.question: What is a major privacy concern in AI?

subsections.title: Responsible AI Development
subsections.content: Responsible AI involves creating systems that adhere to ethical guidelines, ensuring transparency and accountability.

quizzes.question: What is essential for responsible AI development?
